about_the_game:
Shallow Blue is a 2D pixel-style Metroidvania game, featuring multiple freely explorable environments and hidden storylines waiting to be uncovered by players. You will play as Tester No. 13, controlling a mech in the game, using platforming skills and combat abilities to defeat various enemies and clear levels. While immersing yourself in the mech action, don’t forget to ensure that No. 13 maintains a balanced diet and adequate sleep for optimal performance.

Levels and Combat:

Control your mech as you run and jump through industrial sci-fi-style environments, exploring scenes and uncovering the storyline. Defeat a wide variety of enemies and face the final boss in epic confrontations.

Build Your Own Mecha:

Purchase powerful equipment in the module shop and freely customize your mech. Combine modules to create a mech warrior that suits your playstyle, enhancing mobility, offensive power, and defensive capabilities to dominate the battlefield.

Role-Playing:

Players take on the role of Tester No. 13, living in a closed-off base filled with rooms and public spaces to explore freely. The base is rich with interactive environmental objects and NPCs, offering a deep and immersive experience as you uncover secrets and progress through the game.

Game Features::

-Pixel Art

-Realistic Time and Health System

-Hidden Storylines and Easter Eggs

It is known that some computers may experience screen flickering when playing the game. This issue involves overall performance optimization and cannot be resolved for the time being. We are very sorry if this situation causes players to have a bad experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 | AMD R7 370
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 | Intel i5 Skylake
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 | AMD RX 570
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: You are No. 13, a new game tester joining the Shallow Blue project. Following orders from your superiors, complete the testing of this mech game. But don't forget to maintain a healthy life and take care of the essential tasks that must be done.
